138343.<%sM_ITEM>の書を 捨てて\n<%sM_GET_ITEM>の書を 手に入:
I'll get rid of the <%sM_ITEM> book and get
the <%sM_GET_ITEM> book... Are you sure you
want to do this?<yesno2><close>

138344.スキルノートが いっぱいで\nこれ以上 手に入れることが できません。\nどのス:
My skill notebooks are full and I can't get
any more... Which skill notes do you want to
get rid of?<break>

139149.手に入れなかった スキルノートは\nこの場で 消えてしまいます。\n本当に よろ:
Any skill notes you didn't get will disappear
right here... Are you sure you want to do
this?<yesno2><close>

139155.この スキルノートを 手に入れますか？\n<yesno><close>:
Would you like to get your hands on this
skill notebook?<yesno><close>

139180.すでに <%sM_CATEGORY>のノートを\n覚えているので このスキルとは:
I've already memorized the <%sM_CATEGORY>
note, so I can replace it with this skill...<bw_break>

139285.同じ系統のスキルは ひとつしか\n覚えることが できません。\n忘れるスキルを:
You can only learn one skill in the same
line. Choose a skill you'd like to forget.<break>

139288.忘れるスキルを 選んでください。\n<break>: Pick a skill you'd like to forget.<break>

140707.書かれているスキルが\nすべて同じスキルノートを すでに もっていた！\n<br:
I already had a skill notebook with all the
same skills written in it!<pc> Shut up and take your skill notes.<end>

142630.この スキルノートを 持っていきますか？\n<yesno><close>:
Would you like to take these skill notes with
you?<yesno><close>

142763.<%sM_CATEGORY>のノートは\nすでに おぼえています。\nおなじ系統:
I've already memorized the notes for
<%sM_CATEGORY>... You can replace it with a
skill from the same family...<break>

143598.習得中の スキルノートは\n捨てる事が できません。\n他のスキルノートを 選ん:
You can't throw away the skill notes you're
learning. You can choose a different skill
note...<bw_break>

151938.<color_yellow>\nすでに クルクルポシェットへ送った\nスキルノー:
<color_yellow>I've already sent them to Kurukuru Pochette,
but she's full of skill notes. Let's go get
our reward!<end>
